description: A plate with a flattened rim. A four-sided scalloped medallion with 4 rui heads and various diaper patterns. A central decoration of symbols. Panels decorated with flowers and symbols.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A plate with a flattened rim. A four-sided scalloped medallion with rui heads and radial panels and diaper patterns. A central decoration of two fish (carp) among weeds. Panels decorated with peaches and symbols.
creator: : anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
subject: Iconclasscode: 25F6

description: A plate with a flattened rim. A four-sided scalloped medallion with two facing radial panels and various diaper patterns. The narrow panels on cavetto and rim are, contrary to the other groups, filled at the top with a flower instead of a diaper pattern. A central decoration of a cicada on a rock and an orchidtype of flower. Panels decorated with flowers, peaches and symbols.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
subject: Iconclasscode: 25G

description: A plate with a flattened rim. A star-shaped medallion with 4 rui heads and various diaper patterns. These plates all have a central decoration of symbols; the decoration on cavetto and rim are also similar. Another typical feature of these plates is the pattern resembling the imprint of woven cloth in the centre, under the glaze. A central decoration of an insect on a rock. Panels decorated with peaches and symbols.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A saucer with a flattened rim. A saucer with a flattened rim. A central decoration of a cicada on a rock. Panels decorated with peaches and flowers.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A dish without a flattened rim. A scalloped medallion within a star-shaped medallion with various patterns. A central decoration of a frog on a lotus and an insect in a marsh landscape, all very finely painted. The encircling diaper pattern consists of chrysanthemums on a blue background. The medallions decorated with alternately a peach or flower and a symbol.
creator: : anoniem
title: Bord uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A dish without a flattened rim. A scalloped medallion with rui heads alternating with radial panels within a star-shaped medallion, filled with various diaper patterns. A central decoration of a grasshopper on a chrysanthemum near a rock. The medallions decorated with alternately a peach or a flower and a symbol.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Schaal uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

title: Venus naast haar wagen op de wolken gezeten

description: Kan van steengoed met tinnen deksel. De hals is versierd met arabesk-ornament. Op de buik ingegrift ruitwerk en drie ovalen met leeuwenkoppen.
